error.unexpected: Erro inesperado na comunicação com o servidor Audi Connect

refresh_vehicle_data.name: Refresh Vehicle Data
refresh_vehicle_data.description: Requests an update of the vehicle state directly, as opposed to the normal update mechanism which only retrieves data from the cloud.

vin.name: VIN
vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the Audi vehicle. This should be a 17-character identifier unique to each vehicle.

execute_vehicle_action.name: Execute Vehicle Action
execute_vehicle_action.description: Performs various actions on the vehicle.

vin.name: VIN
vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the Audi vehicle. This should be a 17-character identifier unique to each vehicle.

action.name: Action
action.description: The specific action to perform on the vehicle. Note that available actions may vary based on the vehicle.

start_climate_control.name: Start Climate Control
start_climate_control.description: Start the climate control with options for temperature, glass surface heating, and auto seat comfort.

vin.name: VIN
vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the Audi vehicle. This should be a 17-character identifier unique to each vehicle.

temp_f.name: Target Temperature (Fahrenheit)
temp_f.description: (Optional) Set temperature in °F. Defaults to 70°F if not provided. Overrides 'temp_c'.

temp_c.name: Target Temperature (Celsius)
temp_c.description: (Optional) Set temperature in °C. Defaults to 21°C if not provided. Overridden if 'temp_f' is provided.

glass_heating.name: Glass Surface Heating
glass_heating.description: (Optional) Enable or disable glass surface heating.

seat_fl.name: Auto Seat Comfort: Front-Left
seat_fl.description: (Optional) Enable or disable Auto Seat Comfort for the front-left seat.

seat_fr.name: Auto Seat Comfort: Front-Right
seat_fr.description: (Optional) Enable or disable Auto Seat Comfort for the front-right seat.

seat_rl.name: Auto Seat Comfort: Rear-Left
seat_rl.description: (Optional) Enable or disable Auto Seat Comfort for the rear-left seat.

seat_rr.name: Auto Seat Comfort: Rear-Right
seat_rr.description: (Optional) Enable or disable Auto Seat Comfort for the rear-right seat.

refresh_cloud_data.name: Refresh Cloud Data
refresh_cloud_data.description: Retrieves current cloud data without triggering a vehicle refresh. Data may be outdated if the vehicle has not checked in recently. For best results, use 30 seconds after a command.
